include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (CARES_ARCHIVE "${CARES_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/.libs/libcares.a")

register_external_lib (libcares ${CARES_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${CARES_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${CARES_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_CARES")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${CARES_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_CARES")
